name: Hostage Rescue in Tatooine
description: Hostage rescue in Tatooine is a first person game where you have to save the hostage by avoiding or eliminating the enemies. The game takes place in two phases. In the first you have to join the hostage, paying attention to the enemies who are patrolling the city. In phase two you must reach the escape location with the hostage, watch out for enemies who are more vigilant.
